a machine learning engineer at Expedia Group. deploying systems handling several thousands of machine learning models to compete in the algorithmic marketing space. studied at University of Sussex and Imperial College London.

continuously learning, passionate in machine learning, engineering, philosophy, and economics, embracer of creativity.

this place is test grounds for writing my thoughts out - on code designs, patterns, research, and anything in between.
